DOC.brief_summary: This initial proof concept , phase II study aim assess safety efficacy UK-500,001 chronic maintenance treatment adult Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study Safety Efficacy UK-500,001 Adult Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: Moderatesevere COPD ( Global inititiative chronic Obstructive Lung Disease , GOLD , 2003 definition ) Smoking history least 10 packyears Any significant comorbid disease Use maintenance therapy except short act bronchodilator
